name: Gun and Girl
description:
Guns and Girls is a third-person shooter game
The game features a combination of shooting and puzzle elements

The game contains two modes, task mode and infinite mode
Mission Mode:
In different levels, you must find a way to meet the conditions and defeat powerful enemies
Infinite mode:
Enemies will appear infinitely, the player's goal is to get a high score

More character appearances can be unlocked in the game
